Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about Cuvio's AI meal planner and features.

Getting Started

How does Cuvio's AI meal planner work?

Cuvio uses advanced AI to analyze your available ingredients, dietary preferences, cooking skills, and nutritional goals to generate personalized meal plans in under 2 minutes. Our AI considers seasonal produce, your location, budget, and household size to create the perfect meal plan for you.

How do I get started with Cuvio?

Getting started is easy! Download the app, create your account, set your preferences (dietary needs, cooking time, household size, etc.), choose your persona, and start generating meal plans. The whole setup takes less than 5 minutes.

Is Cuvio free to use?

Cuvio offers a free 3-day trial with no credit card required. After the trial, you can choose from our affordable subscription plans or cancel anytime. We believe everyone deserves access to stress-free meal planning.

Features & Functionality

What are the different meal planning modes?

Cuvio offers three modes: Plan Mode for multi-day meal planning with multiple meal types, Meal Mode for single meal generation, and Leftovers Mode for creating meals from existing ingredients. Each mode allows you to select preferred proteins and carbs for maximum flexibility.

How does the AI Assistant work during cooking?

Our AI Assistant provides contextual cooking advice directly within recipes. Ask for ingredient substitutions, cooking tips, or clarification on techniques. The AI understands your preferences and suggests alternatives that maintain the dish's flavor profile while accommodating your dietary needs.

What are the different personas available?

Cuvio offers 6 unique personas: Wellness Witch (focuses on nourishing, anti-inflammatory meals), Desk Warrior (prioritizes quick, efficient meals), Budget Alchemist (maximizes value and minimizes waste), Family Hero (creates crowd-pleasing family meals), Culinary Adventurer (explores global cuisines and bold flavors), and Analysis Gourmand (optimizes for precise nutritional targets).

How does nutrition tracking work?

Set your macro and calorie targets, and Cuvio ensures every meal plan helps you meet your nutritional goals. Get detailed macro and micronutrient information for every recipe, plus nutrition tips and insights to optimize your health journey.

How does seasonal produce optimization work?

Share your location and Cuvio will prioritize seasonal, locally available ingredients in your meal plans. This approach is better for your health, wallet, and the environment while ensuring you get the freshest, most nutritious produce available in your area.

Ingredients & Recipes

Can I use ingredients I already have in my fridge?

Yes! Cuvio's Leftovers Mode specializes in creating recipes from ingredients you already have. Simply take a photo of your fridge contents or input what's available, and our AI will suggest delicious meals to use them up, reducing food waste and saving money.

Can I save and favorite recipes?

Yes! Like meals you love to save them to your favorites, and access your 10 most recent meal plans. You can also swap any recipe for a new one or choose from your favorites, with shopping lists updating automatically.

How accurate are the nutritional calculations?

Our nutritional calculations are based on comprehensive food databases and are regularly updated. We provide macro and micronutrient information for every recipe, though we recommend consulting with a healthcare professional for specific dietary needs.

Dietary & Health

Does Cuvio work for families with dietary restrictions?

Absolutely! Cuvio accommodates all dietary restrictions including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, keto, paleo, and many others. Our AI learns your preferences and suggests appropriate alternatives while maintaining delicious flavors.

Can I set specific health goals?

Yes! Cuvio supports various health goals including weight loss, muscle building, energy optimization, heart health, and brain health. Set your macro targets and health objectives, and our AI will create meal plans that support your goals.

How does Cuvio handle allergies?

You can set your allergies and food intolerances in your preferences. Cuvio will avoid these ingredients and suggest safe alternatives. Our AI is trained to recognize cross-contamination risks and will warn you about potential issues.

Technical & Support

What devices does Cuvio work on?

Cuvio is available on iOS devices through the App Store. We're working on an Android version that will be available soon. The app works on both phones and tablets.

Do I need an internet connection?

Yes, Cuvio requires an internet connection to generate meal plans and access the AI features. However, once you've generated a meal plan, you can view recipes and shopping lists offline.

How do I contact support?

You can contact our support team at info@cuvio.co.uk. We typically respond within 24 hours and are here to help with any questions or issues you might have.

Still Have Questions?

Contact our support team or start your free trial to experience Cuvio for yourself.
